      • submit

        public void submit​(ShadoProcess process)
        Give the CPU a process to execute
        Parameters:
        process - The process to execute

      • contextSwitch

        public ShadoProcess contextSwitch​(ShadoProcess newProcess)
        Switch the running process with a new one NOTE: it also changes the burst time of the old process that will be returned
        Parameters:
        newProcess - The new process to execute
        Returns:
        Returns the old process

      • checkIORequests

        public void checkIORequests()
        This function checks if the process want to access the IO. If yes the process will be connected to the IO handler and will free the cpu

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        a processor is available if the elapsed time since the beginning of the task is less than or equal to the THEORETICAL time of the process
        Returns:
        If the processor is available

      • getProcess

        public ShadoProcess getProcess()
        Returns:
        Returns the process that is being handled

      • timeTakenByProcess

        public long timeTakenByProcess()
        Returns:
        Returns the time that the process has spent on the CPU
